name: Memories (itch) (Şevval Kaya, dionxy, ilaylay)
description:
Objects that he sees, remind him some memories. But, what did he forget?

W, A, S, D to move

X to interact

This game has been made during the Bilgi GGJ'21 with the lost and found theme.

Şevval Kaya - Game Developer, Game Designer

İlayda Pınarbaşı - 3D Artist, UI Artist, Narrative Designer

Burak Pınarbaşı - 3D Artist, Animator

Music: Levi's Choice - Attack on Titan Season 3
